00016 clElement2D::clElement2D(clUnstructured2D *surfaceGrid, const int numberID, const int nNodes, const int nFaces, const int nFaceNodes)
00017 {
00018   parentGrid = surfaceGrid;
00019 
00020   SetNumberID(numberID);
00021   ResetInitialised();
00022   ResetHalo();
00023   ResetBoundary();
00024 
00025   area = (double)(-1);
00026 
00027   SetNumberNodes(nNodes);
00028   SetNumberFaces(nFaces);
00029   SetNumberFaceNodes(nFaceNodes);
00030 
00031   // Reset all references to nodes and faces
00032   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++) nodeIDArray.SetItem(n, -1);
00033   for(int f=0; f<GetNumberFaces(); f++) neighbourIDArray.SetItem(f, -1);
00034 }

00036 clElement2D::clElement2D(clUnstructured2D *surfaceGrid, const int nNodes, const int nFaces, const int nFaceNodes)
00037 {
00038   parentGrid = surfaceGrid;
00039 
00040   SetNumberID(0);
00041   ResetInitialised();
00042   ResetHalo();
00043   ResetBoundary();
00044 
00045   area = (double)(-1);
00046 
00047   SetNumberNodes(nNodes);
00048   SetNumberFaces(nFaces);
00049   SetNumberFaceNodes(nFaceNodes);

00052   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++) nodeIDArray.SetItem(n, -1);
00053   for(int f=0; f<GetNumberFaces(); f++) neighbourIDArray.SetItem(f, -1);

00124 int clElement2D::GetNodeID(const int index) const
00125 {
00126   /*
00127   ** Returns the node ID given the node index
00128   */
00129 
00130   if(index<0 || index>=GetNumberNodes())
00131   {
00132     throw clException("clElement2D", "GetNodeID", "Invalid index specification.");
00133   }
00134 
00135   return(nodeIDArray.GetItem(index));
00136 }
00137 
00138 int clElement2D::GetNeighbourID(const int index) const
00139 {
00140   /*
00141   ** Returns the neighbour ID given a face index
00142   */
00143 
00144   if(index<0 || index>=GetNumberFaces())
00145   {
00146     throw clException("clElement2D", "GetNeighbourID", "Invalid index specification.");
00147   }
00148 
00149   return(neighbourIDArray.GetItem(index));
00150 }

00152 int clElement2D::SetNodeID(const int nodeIndex, const int nodeID)
00153 {
00154   /*
00155   ** Sets the node ID for a given node index
00156   */
00157 
00158   if(nodeIndex<0 || nodeIndex>=GetNumberNodes())
00159   {
00160     throw clException("clElement2D", "SetNodeID", "Invalid index specified.");
00161   }
00162 
00163   // Set the node
00164   nodeIDArray.SetItem(nodeIndex, nodeID);
00165 
00166   return(GetNumberNodes());
00167 }

00169 int clElement2D::SetNeighbourID(const int faceIndex, const int neighbourID)
00170 {
00171   /*
00172   ** Sets the neighbour ID for a given face index
00173   */
00174 
00175   if(faceIndex<0 || faceIndex>=GetNumberFaces())
00176   {
00177     throw clException("clElement2D", "SetNeighbourID", "Invalid index specified.");
00178   }
00179 
00180   // Set the face
00181   neighbourIDArray.SetItem(faceIndex, neighbourID);
00182 
00183   return(GetNumberFaces());
00184 }

00186 void clElement2D::DeleteNodeRef(const int nodeIndex)
00187 {
00188   /*
00189   ** Sets the node ID to -1 given a node index
00190   */
00191 
00192   try
00193   {
00194     nodeIDArray.SetItem(nodeIndex, -1);
00195   }
00196 
00197   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00198   {
00199     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement2D::DeleteNodeRef");
00200     throw EX;
00201   }
00202 }

00222 int clElement2D::GetNodeIndex(const int nodeID) const
00223 {
00224   int nodeIndex = 0;
00225 
00226   try
00227   {
00228     while(nodeIndex<GetNumberNodes() && GetNodeID(nodeIndex)!=nodeID)
00229     {
00230       nodeIndex++;
00231     }
00232 
00233     if(nodeIndex>=GetNumberNodes())
00234     {
00235       char message[MESLEN];
00236       sprintf(message, "Could not find node.\n    NODEID   = %d\n", nodeID);
00237       throw clExceptionTree("clElement2D", "GetNodeIndex", message);
00238     }
00239   }
00240 
00241   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00242   {
00243     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement2D::GetNodeIndex");
00244     throw EX;
00245   }
00246 
00247    return(nodeIndex);
00248 }
00249 
00250 int clElement2D::GetFaceIndex(const int neighbourID) const
00251 {
00252   int faceIndex = 0;
00253 
00254   try
00255   {
00256     while(faceIndex<GetNumberFaces() && (GetNeighbourID(faceIndex)!=neighbourID))
00257     {
00258       faceIndex++;
00259     }
00260 
00261     if(GetNeighbourID(faceIndex)!=neighbourID)
00262     {
00263       char message[MESLEN];
00264       sprintf(message, "Could not find faceEntry pointing to neighbour.\n    ELEMENTID   = %d\n    NEIGHBOURID = %d\n", GetNumberID(), neighbourID);
00265       throw clExceptionTree("clElement2D", "GetFaceIndex", message);
00266     }
00267   }
00268 
00269   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00270   {
00271     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement2D::GetFaceIndex");
00272     throw EX;
00273   }
00274 
00275   return(faceIndex);
00276 }

00278 int clElement2D::FindFaceIndex(const int theNeighbourID) const
00279 {
00280   int theFaceIndex = 0;
00281 
00282   try
00283   {
00284     while(theFaceIndex<GetNumberFaces() && (GetNeighbourID(theFaceIndex)!=theNeighbourID))
00285     {
00286       theFaceIndex++;
00287     }
00288 
00289     if(GetNeighbourID(theFaceIndex)!=theNeighbourID)
00290     {
00291       char message[MESLEN];
00292       sprintf(message, "Could not find faceIndex pointing to neighbour.\n    ELEMENTID   = %d\n    NEIGHBOURID = %d\n", GetNumberID(), theNeighbourID);
00293       throw clExceptionTree("clElement2D", "FindFaceIndex", message);
00294     }
00295   }
00296 
00297   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00298   {
00299     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement2D::FindFaceIndex");
00300     throw EX;
00301   }
00302 
00303   return(theFaceIndex);
00304 }

00306 bool clElement2D::IsElementNode(const int nodeID) const
00307 {
00308   bool ret = false;
00309 
00310   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes() && !ret; n++)
00311   {
00312     if(GetNodeID(n) == nodeID)
00313     {
00314       ret =  true;
00315     }
00316   }
00317 
00318   return(ret);
00319 }

00370 int clElement2D::IsNodeInElement(const clNode2D *theNode) const
00371 {
00372   //
00373   // IN :    *theNode    = the node to be investigated
00374   // RETURN: ID of current tetrahedron in case it covers theNode,
00375   //         or ID of one of the neighbours.
00376   //
00377   int    elementID = GetNumberID();
00378   double det       = 1.0f;
00379   bool   onFace    = false;
00380 
00381   try
00382   {
00383     // Translate node indices in face system to node indices in parentgrid system
00384     int faceNodes[GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00385 
00386     //
00387     // Search all faces as long as the face vertices form a left-handed axes system.
00388     // (det>0 --> left-handed axes system --> theNode on the inside of triangle).
00389     //
00390     int f=0;
00391     while(det>=0.0f && f<GetNumberFaces())
00392     {
00393       // Get the node indices in tetrahedron system
00394       GetFaceNodes(f, faceNodes);
00395 
00396       // Get NodeIDs
00397       int idNode0 = GetNodeID(faceNodes[0]);
00398       int idNode1 = GetNodeID(faceNodes[1]);
00399 
00400       // Get node indices in surfaceGrid system
00401       int inNode0 = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(idNode0);
00402       int inNode1 = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(idNode1);
00403 
00404       // Get Node Pointers
00405       clNode2D *node0 = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(inNode0);
00406       clNode2D *node1 = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(inNode1);
00407 
00408       // Set up vectors
00409       double x1 = node1->x() - node0->x();
00410       double x2 = node1->y() - node0->y();
00411 
00412       double y1 = theNode->x() - node0->x();
00413       double y2 = theNode->y() - node0->y();
00414 
00415       det = x1*y2 - x2*y1;
00416 
00417       if(det==0.0f) onFace = true;
00418 
00419       f++;
00420     }
00421 
00422     if(det<0.0f)
00423     {
00424       // Continue with neighbour element
00425       f--;
00426       elementID=GetNeighbourID(f);
00427     }
00428     else if(onFace)
00429     {
00430       char message[MESLEN];
00431       sprintf(message, "Node positioned on face of element.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00432 //      throw clExceptionTree("clElement2D", "IsNodeInElement", message);
00433     }
00434   }
00435 
00436   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00437   {
00438     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement2D::IsNodeInElement");
00439     throw EX;
00440   }
00441 
00442   return(elementID);
00443 }

00447   area = (double) (-1);

00450 double clElement2D::GetArea(void)
00451 {

00453   return(area);

00456 clElement2D& clElement2D::Assign(const clElement2D &source)
00457 {
00458   SetParentGrid(source.GetParentGrid());
00459   SetNumberID(source.GetNumberID());
00460   SetNumberNodes(source.GetNumberNodes());
00461   SetNumberFaces(source.GetNumberFaces());
00462   SetNumberFaceNodes(source.GetNumberFaceNodes());
00463 
00464   source.IsInitialised() ? SetInitialised() : ResetInitialised();
00465   source.IsHalo() ? SetHalo() : ResetHalo();
00466   source.IsBoundary() ? SetBoundary() : ResetBoundary();
00467 
00468   for(int n=0; n<source.GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00469   {
00470     SetNodeID(n, source.GetNodeID(n));
00471   }
00472 
00473   for(int f=0; f<source.GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00474   {
00475     SetNeighbourID(f, source.GetNeighbourID(f));
00476   }
00477 
00478   return(*this);
00479 }
00480 
00481 clElement2D& clElement2D::operator=(const clElement2D &source)
00482 {
00483   return(Assign(source));
00484 }
00485 
00486 bool clElement2D::IsEqual(const clElement2D &source) const
00487 {
00488   /*
00489   ** Does not evaluate 'numberID'
00490   */
00491   int ret = 0; //0 = not equal; 1 = equal
00492 
00493   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00494   {
00495     if(GetNodeID(n) != source.GetNodeID(n))
00496     {
00497       ret = false;
00498     }
00499   }
00500 
00501   for(int f=0; f<GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00502   {
00503     if(GetNeighbourID(f) != source.GetNeighbourID(f))
00504     {
00505       ret = false;
00506     }
00507   }
00508 
00509   return(ret);
00510 }
00511 
00512 bool clElement2D::operator==(const clElement2D &source) const
00513 {
00514   return(IsEqual(source));
00515 }
00516 
00517 bool clElement2D::operator!=(const clElement2D &source) const
00518 {
00519   return(!IsEqual(source));
00520 }
